channel.title: BUscience
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUscience, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Finding critical minerals from scoops of sand
item.description: Smartphones, batteries and satellites all require critical minerals like cobalt, niobium and tin. As society increasingly relies on these minerals to ...

item.title: New paradigm of drug discovery with world's first atomic editing?
item.description: Researchers have successfully develop single-atom editing technology that maximizes drug efficacy.

item.title: New 3D printing technique creates unique objects quickly and with less waste
